title: FS: 1906 W601 Sporting Life Pittsburgh team postcard...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: FS: 1906 W601 Sporting Life Pittsburgh team postcard...
posts.post_content:
Here's the W601 Sporting Life Pittsburgh Pirates team postcard.  HOFers include Hans, Fred Clarke, and Barney Dreyfuss.  Tough postcard!

The price is $2600 via secure shipping in the conus, payment preferably by personal/bank check, but ppff accepted from long standing, known members. 

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing discussions.  

Please send a PM if interested.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/89030/w601[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/89031/w601[/IMG]
